solution_line_template: Hazel walked {first_hour_km} x {multiplier_second_hour} = <<{first_hour_km}*{multiplier_second_hour}={second_hour_km}>>{second_hour_km} kilometers in the second hour.
So, she walked {first_hour_km} + {second_hour_km} = <<{first_hour_km}+{second_hour_km}={total_km}>>{total_km} kilometers for 2 hours.
